snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency suspended the accreditation of the drug-testing laboratory in South Africa, the only accredited facility in Africa.
abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency suspends accreditation of Africa's only accredited drug-testing laboratory, in Bloemfontein, South Africa, until after 2016 Rio Olympics; other doping news noted.
lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency suspended the accreditation of the drug-testing laboratory in South Africa, the only accredited facility in Africa.

headline.main: WADA Suspends Lab in South Africa
